name: Memory Stroll
description:
Memory Stroll

Memory Stroll is a memory game. With 100+ hidable objects in the game, you're guaranteed that every day is different from and to school. Be observant and figure out what is missing from your walk to school vs. your walk back home from school. 

Key Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement

Space- Jump

TAB - Open Photo Camera

ESC - Open Settings/Exit

M - Open Map

Gameplay

The objective is to observe your surroundings very carefully on your way to school every morning. On your walk back home, take a picture of every object that is no longer there from your walk to school. Finding all the hidden objects will allow you to move onto the next day but miss even one, it will reset you to day one. In this challenging memory game, how many days will you be able to make it to? 

(Trees, lamp posts, bushes and buildings are objects which cannot be hidden. Tree stumps and logs, however, can be hidden.)
